credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Infant's cap
medium:
Medium: silk, linen, metal-wrapped silk cord
Technique: stem satin and knot embroidery stitches using silk on plain weave; stem, satin and laid work using metal-wrapped silk cord on plain weave; couched metal-wrapped silk; plain weave linen backing; bobbin lace trim
description: Infant's cap, probably for christening, of silk embroidered in colored silk and silver. Pattern of heavy flowers, in reds, blues, greens, with centers and accents in metal. Gold lace edging.
name: Infant's cap
